Summary: Boomerang cloud forms in sky.....object slowly flies out of cloud.
divs: Sighting DetailsI WAS STANDING OUTSIDE ENJOYING THE FULL MOON,,AND THE QUIET....WHILE SITTING IN MY CHAIR I NOTICED IT WAS A VERY CLEAR NIGHT...NOT A CLOUD IN THE SKY.. EVEN THOUGH IT CLOUDY ALL DAY.....I LEANED BACK IN THE CHAIR..AND AS I LOOKED UP IN THE SKY THIS BOOMERANG SHAPE CLOUD JUST APPEARED OUT OF NOWHERE....OUT OF THIS CLOUD SOMETHING FLEW OUT VERY SLOWLY AT FIRST..AND THEN SPED UP TOWARD MADISON ...THIS CLOUD WAS VERY DIM.AND TOOK ABOUT 5 MINUTES TO DISAPPEAR...IT NEVER LOST SHAPE ..BUT GOT SMALLER IN SIZE TILL IT WAS GONE....I SEE LOTS OF STRANGE THINGS OVER THIS RIVER!!!!!
trends: There have been no other sightings in Merrimac
This sighting has never been favorited.
